QuestData.Title: Tuning the Gnomecorder
QuestData.Description: The gnomecorder looks to be in working order. I've got you all hooked up, now we just need to tune the gnomecorder for reception.$B$BHead north out of Lakeshire and follow the road up to the graveyard. Once you reach the graveyard I'll attempt to transmit.
QuestData.AreaDescription: Test the Gnomecorder at the Lakeshire Graveyard
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Reception coming in loud and clear!
QuestData.LogDescription: Go to the Lakeshire Graveyard to tune the Gnomecorder.
QuestData.RewardText: <The gnomecorder crackles and pops.>$B$BCan you hear me, $n? Is this thing on? Ah, yes, I see you there now.$B$BLet's get to work!
